Vampiric Touch is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Vampiric Touch is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Necromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Vampiric Touch Information
